post_content:

Cards are clean and have great centering and eye appeal.

Will listen to offers.  

1. T206 Walter Johnson Hands at Chest SC 350-460/25 PSA 4 - *SOLD*

2. T206 Mordecai Brown Portrait PSA 4 - *SOLD*
